abstract.para: This Developer Guide is intended for software developers who want to use the Rackspace Cloud Identity Service v2.0 API for identity management and authentication to Rackspace Cloud Services, which is an implementation of the OpenStack Keystone Identity Service. Developers will learn how to use the v2.0 API for authentication, identity administration, and access control.
